column2: `Relexa hotel Stuttgarter Hof Berlin, Anhalter Stra√üe 8, 10963 Berlin, Germany <https://www.google.com/maps/preview#!q=relexa+hotel+Stuttgarter+Hof+Berlin%2C+Anhalter+Stra%C3%9Fe+8%2C+10963+Berlin%2C+Germany&data=!4m15!1m14!4m8!1m3!1d33586856!2d-95.677068!3d37.0625!3m2!1i1920!2i989!4f13.1!10b1!26m3!1e12!1e13!1e3>`_
Developers, Coders, Users and just about anyone interested in contributing to Varnish in any way.

The plan is to have sessions to improve documentation,plan the Varnish 4.0 release parties around the world, share and exchange experiences with VCL, ask general questions about Varnish and anything else you can think of.
please add yourself to the `meeting's wiki page <https://old.varnish-cache.org/trac/wiki/VCH13Q4>`_ or send an email to `ruben(at)varnish-software-com <mailto:ruben@varnish-software.com>`_.
